title: Perma Banned, It's lit
body:
These are the chats that got me permabanned. I'm not saying im not toxic, I am not saying I didn't deserve it. Just showing everyone what chats (majority of which to my irl friend), got me permabanned. I think it was a little harsh but it is what it is. If "wack" isn't tolerated then so be it. Yolo
Game 1
The Clean One: beast
The Clean One: gp
The Clean One: 6

The Clean One: in terms of play rn
The Clean One: not one counter gank
The Clean One: has been given

The Clean One: but u still in base

The Clean One: beast
The Clean One: that dont move strat
The Clean One: beast
The Clean One: ?

The Clean One: he ahs
The Clean One: that fkin slow dude
The Clean One: wtf
The Clean One: idk
The Clean One: lulu
The Clean One: me
The Clean One: and me
The Clean One: ur 2/5
The Clean One: lol
The Clean One: bth of u
The Clean One: yall nice
The Clean One: dont pull it bro
The Clean One: ff
The Clean One: cme
The Clean One: wu
The Clean One: leave wave
The Clean One: come
The Clean One: need
The Clean One: need wu
The Clean One: dont

The Clean One: ive been fine for months maybe years
The Clean One: bro
The Clean One: what the fucl
The Clean One: wouldnt go off
The Clean One: it said 2
The Clean One: because somehow
The Clean One: it went on CD
The Clean One: without shooting nado
The Clean One: thats actuallly glitch idk
The Clean One: this guy has relic
The Clean One: and he doesnt die?
The Clean One: akalitoo strong
The Clean One: him too
The Clean One: idk wtf goin on

replies.body:
You did not get banned for specific words, you got banned for tilting off the face of the earth and flaming/annoying your team constantly, by my assessment.

Maybe PvP games are not for you?
people in low and high elo do that game in and game out? lol Tyler1 flames his team and the other team with "banter" every game.

> [{quoted}](name=The Clean One,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=besVLY1A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-13T20:59:09.274+0000)
>
> people in low and high elo do that game in and game out? lol Tyler1 flames his team and the other team with "banter" every game.

You type 5 times as much as Tyler, and your "banter" is beyond what Tyler decides to type.
it was just an example my guy, just imagine the people ten times worse than me

Upon reported, the system will assign a toxicity grade to the reported game (ex. 0=no toxicity, 100 = hate speech). If you reached an accumulated grade of 100 within a certain number of games, the system will punish you.

You surely have displayed a consistent mild toxicity in these chat logs, so you are rightfully punished.

If people in Tyler1 games don't report him, then it means the system won't check for toxicity, thus no punishment for him.

Other people will also be judged on their accumulated behavior. So if they have reached a toxicity grade of 100, they will get punished as well.

I didnt know that. That actually makes more sense then. Regardless I think the system is pretty wack and takes out a trash talking element to the video game. Not saying I wasn't toxic again, or what I was doing was trash talking. I was clearly beyond tilted. Either way too late, thanks for the info

> [{quoted}](name=The Clean One,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=besVLY1A,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2018-02-14T07:26:59.395+0000)
>
> I didnt know that. That actually makes more sense then. Regardless I think the system is pretty wack and takes out a trash talking element to the video game. Not saying I wasn't toxic again, or what I was doing was trash talking. I was clearly beyond tilted. Either way too late, thanks for the info

There's a difference and a fine line between trash talking and pointless raging/flaming though, and we have to be careful not to cross that line too much if at all. Also, even though you say most of what you said in your reform card was directed at your friend you have to remember that you two aren't the only people in the game or on your team and as such what you two find as light-hearted banter others may find as needless rage and flame. Just try to be mindful of other people in the future when bantering with each other in a way that might come off as rude and disrespectful, or at the very least keep it in private chat so you don't run this risk again.
eh thanks for the insight but there is no future I am permabanned lol

> [{quoted}](name=The Clean One,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=besVLY1A,comment-id=00000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-14T18:11:54.037+0000)
>
> eh thanks for the insight but there is no future I am permabanned lol

You could always make a new account and prove on that one that you've improved your behavior, but if you do then expect it to eventually meet the same fate as your old one did should you continue with the same behavior that got it permabanned. The choice is up to you though.

> [{quoted}](name=The Clean One,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=besVLY1A,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-13T21:16:36.470+0000)
>
> it was just an example my guy, just imagine the people ten times worse than me

Gotcha!

Honestly, I would say these logs are rather soft compared to the average we see on this forum. Highly doubt these games alone was the reason for your penalty as you pretty much just show attitude and not much else, which is worth appreciating '**sort of said**'.

Guess you have a rather edgy backstory!

> [{quoted}](name=The Clean One,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=besVLY1A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-13T20:59:09.274+0000)
>
> people in low and high elo do that game in and game out? lol Tyler1 flames his team and the other team with "banter" every game.

So you think Riot decided to single you out for some reason? You're just that special that they let everyone else get away with it, but not you?
Did I say that?

> [{quoted}](name=The Clean One,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=besVLY1A,comment-id=0000000000020000,timestamp=2018-02-14T07:27:28.834+0000)
>
> Did I say that?

Hmmm... yeah no I guess you didn't imply that. My bad man. Was thinking you thought your ban was unfair or something but you did specifically say you know you deserved it and what not. Sorry.

> [{quoted}](name=The Clean One,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=besVLY1A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-13T20:59:09.274+0000)
>
> people in low and high elo do that game in and game out? lol Tyler1 flames his team and the other team with "banter" every game.

And Tyler1 spent about 18 months with a special escalated personal ban on sight for all accounts.

His accounts are still all permbanned, he just has permission to make new ones now, provided he behaves.
High elo players know each other and are all friends, and even then they get and report toxic players. You just don't see some streamers do it because they literally don't care.

THANK YOU JESUS THANK YOU!!!!!!!!!!! DUDE  I PLAYED WITH YOU I WAS ONE OF THE JGERS  YOU WERE TOXIC AS HELL... I REPORTED  U QUICK I DONT SEE THE MATCH IN THOSE CHATS BUT YOU DESERVED IT 10000000% THANK YOU RIOT FOR CLEANING THIS CLOWN OUT
you're hardstuck silver, I think you got the wrong guy bud
its my first ranked LOL season...  But  i am gold in flex ahha get out of here now  i see why u are ban
Hahahahhahaa I wonder how toxic you were buddy
Your chat log is definitely lit. As lit as a "imma report this person" flare would be.

What's more likely is that you are this way in EVERY game. Severity AND frequency matter. So it's possible you aren't super toxic, but if you are annoying in EVERY SINGLE GAME, then yes, eventually it'll catch up to you.

This is the exact shit i am talking about. Hell no you dont deserve a perma ban. This is crazy !! Not sure what is going on in RIOT headquarters. But i can imagine a scenario like this.  I know it sucks, this game is at its declining state, the toxic behavior is just an excuse to lynch mob the customers to try and justify the declining sales. Its more of the game fault which they refuse to admit and as a result players suffer. They wave the toxic flag and wrap themselves as some patron saints to clean up society as excuse to push their agenda. But refuse to accept if they dont fuck with million changes in game every year the game would not be in this state. The change in rune sytems over and over, Old player cant even come back to this shit. Why do you have million changes a year to keep balancing every champ with endless cycle. Its cause they have gotten too big. The devs are over paid and overstaffed and they need busy work to do. Shit like this is what pisses me off. Scape goating their own player base.
I agree my man
Damn, your team didn't have damage OR damage per second? Fucking a.

Here's a question I haven't seen asked: Have you had any prior punishments recently/semi-recently, particularly a 14 day ban? If you have, that would be why this particular punishment is a permanent ban. The system deals out punishments in an escalating fashion, and if you have already had a 14 day ban in the past, then unfortunately for you the next step is a permanent ban.
if you use chat regularly you Will end up banned.
